title: Rich Homie Quan drops by
description:
Rich Homie Quan is in the building to talk about his latest single and vido "Krazy." He touches on his influences, ATL's impact on the game, why he loves Kobe and Deion, and even has time to roast Jacoby's hairline. Plus! LeBron is on the cover of SI with both of his "Chosen Sons," Jeanie Buss has big praise for Russ that she then has to walk back, and some fans in Toronto got WAY too excited at a baseball game. All that plus you can hear about Jacoby's move, and Jalen remembers a wild anniversary. Tap in! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
